| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                | Type                                                   | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------ | ----------- |

| `hoverCursor` | `hover-cursor` | Whether the cursor should change on hover. | `boolean`                                              | `undefined` |
| `on`          | `on`           | Whether button is on.                      | `boolean`                                              | `undefined` |
